nodes.bodyText: Please avoid doing subjective changes like this  (changing variable names) in the future.
Sorry, this is standard constant naming style. I assume it didn't hurts to change them.
Look at the implementation for BAOS.close().  its empty.

Oh yes !
So I'd rather remove the closing of the BAOS from google-cloud-functions-http
Reverted, I'll update the google-cloud-functions-http extension in another PR, I already have an improvement branch in progress.
Again, this just makes the code less readable.  BAOS.close() doesn't do anything.
